'''''Fishnado''''' is a [[Daily Commission]] in [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Fontaine]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|A few [[Fontemer Aberrant]]s are constantly attacking the schools of fish in these waters. Clear the area and defeat all the Fontemer Aberrants.}}
# Defeat all the Fontemer Aberrants (0/2)

==Gameplay Notes==
* Waiting nearby will cause the Fontemer Aberrants to lose their Pyro shields from standing in the water.

==Rewards==
{{Commission Rewards|full}}
